location: 1st Floor, Basanta Enclave, B. Baruah College Road, Ulubari, Guwahati, Assam - 781007 (India)
about: Win Power Infracon LLP focuses on sustainable power development in rural and semi-urban North Eastern India. Led by CEO Suresh Kr. Agarwalla, the company has roots in United Hardware & Electrical Stores (founded in 1959) and is expanding into civil, real estate, and infrastructure projects while maintaining quality and environmental responsibility.
